What can I say about Portal 2? It's a classic. Pure and simple. Great puzzles, beautiful visuals, and a story that will take you to the deepest recesses of Aperture Science. It's one of the funniest games I've ever played.

This game makes me wanna die 100% of the time but it's a GR8 game 10/10 recommend.

Best FPS-Puzzle game ever... Maybe even best puzzle game ever. Hell, best co-op game ever. Y'know what? One of the best single player stories ever. Most comedic game ever. Most atmospheric game ever. Definately my favorite valve game ever... Even more so than HL2 or TF2... Its that good (In my honest-to-god opinion). The campaign is great, the co-op is great, the steam workshop content is more iffy, but has some really awesome levels too... While I may not have that many hours on steam (at least not as of the time of review), I have played a shitton on PS3 before I even got my own PC. I do have a bit of bias, as this is my first valve game I have played, I think almost everyone can enjoy this game in one way or another. The humor is clever and dark and is what really shines in the main plot. Overall, I'd rate 10/10.

An absolute masterpiece of a game.  Still amazes me how great the Source engine is.  The game is clever, voice acting and music are excellent, puzzles are diverse and interesting.  Usually can be picked up cheap today during a sale.  A great way to spend 10 to 12 hours.
My all time favorite game, tons of replayability with the community workshop.
Awesome!!

Portal 2 это игра где вы можете убивать роботов или быть роботом.Тут есть трейд прикольными шляпками,вы можете создать локацию в мастерской и взорвать ее.вы можете пускать специальные  жидкости (которые имеют свои уникальные характеристики) чтобы пройти уровень.Вам дана отличная возможность превратить прошлого управляющего GLaDOS комплекса  Aperture Science в Бульбу и при возможности зажарить ,ведь за все эти годы я не думаю ,что вас вообще кормили.А если серьезно то это отличная игра с затягивающим сюжетом и продумаными головоломками. Более того, на конференции GDC 2010 директор Valve Гейб Ньюэлл заявил, что Portal 2 — это лучшая игра за всю историю существования компании !
Оценка игры: 
Metacritic
95 из 100
Моя 97,5 из 100 за песенку Турелей ; )

As for an old fan from the first generation to the second generation of this game, the second generation of this game has completely surpassed the first generation, either from the game plot or the game difficulty. The teleport series runs through almost the science. Sometimes this belief is quite touching. When you walk slowly in an old laboratory with weeds, you will look forward to a huge research project of early Aperture technology in awe. When you listen to the smug, old-fashioned president who had been very proud of the record, you will feel the greatness of science pioneers. No nonsense, most of them are recording. Everything makes you explore the process. Although the final Aperture technology is full of ironic outcomes, GLaDOS is the ultimate incarnation of this scientific. On the other hand, the author takes into the emotion of the feelings that game players to play for a long time. The author also draws a good ending of this game.

作为从玩传送门第一代到第二代的老粉丝来说，第二代的作品已经远远超过了第一代。不管是从剧情上还是游戏难度上面，第二部的游戏体验已经完全超过了第一部。传送门系列中贯穿了一种对科学近乎信仰般的狂热，这种信念有时颇为让人感动。当你慢步在长满杂草的老旧实验室，当你敬畏的仰视光圈科技早年庞大的科研项目时，当你听着录音中曾去踌躇满志的总裁一点点沙哑老去的声音，你就能感觉到科学先驱们的伟大。没有对白废话，大部分都是录音，一切都让你探索过程中自己去感受。尽管最后光圈科技的结局都充满了讽刺，GLaDOS本身就是这种科学意志的终极化身，但是原作者考虑到玩家长时间玩游戏的感受，作者对结局也是画上了非常好的句号。

Одна из немногих игры, способных поднять настроение и отвечь от рутины. Хороший сюжет, великолепная озвучка, своеобразный юмор, удобное управление. Отдельной похвалы заслуживает совместный режим игры! 
Первая часть - великолепна, но эта, вторая, - близка к идеалу. Вряд ли можно сделать  игру лучше, чем  Portal 2!
Сетевой режим - на столько увлекательный, что затягивает до глубокой ночи ;)

Although it's a simple game (in a nutshell) it is one of those that has so many memorable moments that you can't forget about them, and if you do, you will want to play it again at some point.

Al momento que escribo estas lineas llevo un par de horas de juego y me animé a realizar este análisis basado en mis expectactivas, y es que luego de haber completado el primer título y haberlo disfrutado mucho junto a uno de los mejores villanos de los videojuegos, me esperaba algo parecido...pero es que Portal 2 supera en absolutamente todos los apartados al primero.

Antes de jugar este título te recomiendo que juegues la primera parte, lo considero fundamental ya que a pesar de ser un juego de puzles, la interación con el "Malvado" es clave para disfrutar plenamente de la experiencia que ofrece y esta secuela se encargarán te recordarte muchas cosas.

Si luego de jugar a la primera parte te sientes satisfecho, pues preparate...este juego es muchisimo mejor.

Gelmiş geçmiş en güzel 'Puzzle' oyunudur. Diğer puzzle oyunarlından en temel farkı derin bir hikayesi olması. Ve bu hikayeyi size anlatmaktan çok etraftaki nesnelerle anlatıyor oluşu. Bazen gördüğünüz bir yazı, bazen gördüğünüz bir fotoğraf size neler olup bittiğini farkına varmanızı sağlıyor.
+ İlk oyuna göre çok daha güzel ve ilk oyundan çok daha farklı mekanikler sunuyor.
+ Co-op ve workshop oyun süresini arttırıyor.
+ İndirimlerde komik bir fiyata, hemen düşünmeden alın!
If you've ever wondered what a perfect game is, this is it. There are no flaws.
